source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_00<tab>Emmanellain is less than his usual effervescent self.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_00<tab>ファルコンネストのエマネランは、どこかぼんやりしているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_01<tab>Old habits are hard to break, as Emmanellain soon proves. Upon realizing that his brother asked you to look after him, the young lord proceeds to press you into duty, bidding you patrol several locations outside Falcon's Nest where wolves have been sighted. Before you can voice your opinion on the matter, Emmanellain vanishes, leaving you with little choice but to carry out the menial task.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_01<tab>エマネランから、巡回の手伝いを押しつけられた。クルザス西部高地のリバーズミートにある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9F5501 /var>」2箇所を見回り、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2126801 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_02<tab>As expected, there were wolves, and as expected, they were no match for you. With luck, Emmanellain will have returned to his post by now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2126801 /var>を討伐した。ファルコンネストの「エマネラン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_03<tab>After congratulating you on a job well done, Emmanellain proudly announces that he has completed his rounds of Falcon's Nest and that yes, all is indeed well. In passing, he mentions that he spoke with Thancred─or the “grizzled fellow” who “made that arsonist confess,” as he puts it─while you were away, and that he employed the same devious techniques on him that he used to press you into wolf-slaying duty. With a sigh, you turn your attention to the wastes outside Falcon's Nest once more.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_03<tab>エマネランに報告した。冒険者が巡回に出ている間に、サンクレッドが訪ねてきたらしい。クルザス西部高地のキャンプ・リバーズミート周辺で「サンクレッド」を探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_04<tab>You find Thancred, as well as two heretics he seemingly saved from a ravenous wolf pack. Together, you return to Falcon's Nest, eager to see what other thrilling tasks Lord Emmanellain has in store.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_04<tab>サンクレッドと合流した。ファルコンネストの「エマネラン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_05<tab>Emmanellain has only praise for you and Thancred. “Gallant heroes” by whose “selfless sacrifice” the safety of the conference's guests has been guaranteed. Flattering as his words are, you cannot help but sense a mocking edge, and you suspect Thancred does as well, given the grinding of his teeth.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_SEQ_05<tab>エマネランに、巡回が済んだことを報告した。これで、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2126801 /var>による被害は防ぐことができるだろう。いつもの調子で喜ぶエマネランだったが、やはりどことなく沈んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_TODO_00<tab>Stand watch for wolves outside Falcon's Nest.
target: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9F5501 /var>を見回って<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2126801 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_000<tab>Hm? Was that Lord Artoirel leaving with the first commander just now?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_000あれ……？
アルトアレール様とルキア様は、
どこかへお出かけですか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENA02233_000_005<tab>Everything is going to be all right. I know it will.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENA02233_000_005見てみろよ、あの門の上！
はぁ～、どんなレリーフが飾られるんだろうなぁ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENB02233_000_010<tab>What sort of trade opportunities might there be? I've never thought about it before, but do the Dravanians even have markets?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENB02233_000_010竜との和平など、信じられないと思っていたが……
私は、皇都で白き竜が子どもを救うのを目の当たりにした。
だからこそ、妻を連れて、はるばる式典を見に来たのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENC02233_000_015<tab>Do you think we'll have to let them come and go as they please? In the capital, I mean. Our roads weren't exactly designed for Dravanians...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_CITIZENC02233_000_015ここの寒さと来たら、相変わらず骨まで凍っちまいそうだよ。
でも、だんだんと式典の見物人が増えてきた。
こりゃあ、私ら技師も、はりきらずにはいられないね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_020<tab>I'm rather busy at the moment, old <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>. Guarding this tavern, as it were.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_020……な、なんだよ相棒。
オレ様を遊びに誘いたい気持ちはよーっくわかるが、
今はそんな気分じゃあ…………

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_021<tab>Oh, I see now. Artoirel thought I might be derelict in my duties, eh? The nerve of my brother to question my dedication!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_021へっ？　さっそく警備をサボってないかって？
ば、ばばっ、馬鹿だな～！
忙しすぎて、ゲイラキャットの手も借りたいくらいだぜ！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_022<tab>...But since you are here, mayhap I can put you to proper use. The wasteland beyond the walls must be kept safe for travelers, yet I have been forbidden from leaving Falcon's Nest.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_022そ、そーだ！
ちょうどいいから、オマエも手を貸してくれよ！
街の外の巡回を、すこーし手伝ってほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_023<tab>It wouldn't do for our esteemed guests to be devoured by wolves, oh no. Yet that is precisely what will happen if we do not cull the roaming packs!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_023なんでも、ここに人が集まってるのを察して、
凶暴な「ゴーストウルフ」の群れが来たらしくてさ。
式典の客が、うっかり食われたら大変だろ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_024<tab>Your map, if I may. Right...there, those are the points our scouts marked for patrol. I'll leave you to it, old <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>. Come, Honoroit─I must return to my rounds!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_024地図に印をしといた場所を見回って、狼どもを始末してくれ！
そんじゃ、オレ様は街中の巡回を頑張るぜ。
……行くぞ、オノロワ！

TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_025)) (( )) 02 /var>様、
お手数おかけしますです、はい……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_030<tab>Terrible imposition though it was, I am relieved that my lord did not think to tend to the wolves by himself.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_030危険な任務をお任せして、すみませんです……。
まあ、エマネラン様が行っても、
怪我人が増えるだけだったかもしれませんが……はい……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_040<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>, Wolves' Bane! It pleases me to inform you that I have completed my rounds, and that all is well in Falcon's Nest.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_040おっ、巡回ご苦労！
こっちも、広場から便所に至るまで、
どこもかしこも異常なしだったぜ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_041<tab>Oh, and there was a grizzled fellow looking for you. You know, the one who made that arsonist confess. Clever, that.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_041……あ、そうだ。
途中で、オマエを探してる男に会ったんだ。
ほら、放火事件の捜査を手伝ってた、銀髪で隻眼の……

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_042<tab>Thancred, was it? He was asking after you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_042あ、そうそう、「サンクレッド」とかいったっけ？
ともかくそいつが、オマエを訪ねてきててさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_043<tab>Anyway, once I noticed the garish weapons he was sporting, I deemed it a waste to leave him be. I dispatched him to an area I neglected to mark on your map...yes, this one. If you hurry, he might still be there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_043あんな強い奴を、ただ待たせておくのもナニかなーって思って、
印をつけ忘れてた場所の見回りを任せといた！
まだ戻ってきてないから、追っかけてみたらどうだ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_050<tab>I suppose we could simply wait here for your friend to return. But, if you're feeling impatient, you are free to go and look for him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_050オマエを訪ねてきた「サンクレッド」なら、
地図に印をつけた地点を、見回りにいったはずだぜ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HERETIC02235_000_055<tab>Stay your weapons! We come in peace!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HERETIC02235_000_055ま、待ってくれ、俺たちに戦う気はない！
イゼル様と交流があったというヴィゾーヴニルとの式典を、
ひとめ見たくてここまで来ただけなんだ……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HERETIC02235_000_056<tab>Lady Iceheart told us tales of Vidofnir. If she would trust in Ser Aymeric, then we too would hear what he has to say. But the wolves caught us unawares, and were it not for this man, we would have surely died.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HERETIC02235_000_056そしたら、ゴーストウルフに襲われて……。
でも、このやたらと強い兄さんが来て、助けてくれたんだ。

TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_060ああ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
よかった、やっとお前に会えた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_061<tab>'Twas fortunate I came when I did. These two would not have fared well against the wolves on their own.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_061ここいらの「ゴーストウルフ」は討伐した。
そこの連中は、和平の式典とやらを見物したいだけだそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_062<tab>The young lord wasted no time taking advantage of you, did he? And me, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_062俺は、お前の手伝いをしたくてな……。
案の定、また面倒事を押しつけられてたんじゃないか？
……すまないが、今は何も聞かずに同行させてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_063<tab>Let us return to Falcon's Nest, then, and see what other thrilling tasks he may have for us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_063さあ、ファルコンネストに戻って、
フォルタン家の次男坊に報告をしてやろう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_070<tab>(It's always the younger one. Every time, without fail.)
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_THANCRED_000_070ははあ、事情がわかってきたぞ……。
こいつ、なかなか困り者の次男坊様なんだな？

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_075<tab>How wonderful, you found Master Thancred! As ever, I could not help but fear the worst.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_HONOROIT_000_075おかえりなさいませ、)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
よかった……サンクレッド様とすれちがっていたら、
どうしようかと思ってました、はい……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_080<tab>And there they are, a pair of gallant heroes if I ever saw them. Comrades-in-arms, reunited at last.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_080よう、相棒！
サンクレッドと無事に再会できたようで、何よりだぜ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_081<tab>By your selfless sacrifice have you guaranteed the safety of our many guests. On behalf of Ishgard, I thank you both.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_081おかげさまで、すべての巡回が完了だ。
狼どもも、簡単には手出しできないってわかって、
棲処に引き返すことだろうよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_082<tab>And with that, there is naught left to do but to enjoy our well-earned respite.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNC105_02235_EMMANELLAIN_000_082これにて、一件落着ってことだな！
いや～、地味で楽しくない仕事だったぜ～！
はははは……はは…………はぁ……。
